name: The Solar System (David)
description:
The Solar System is an educational board game that aims to make our Solar System known through play.

Players must pilot a probe to explore the Solar System’s planets and complete the mission received as quickly as possible. To do this, players will have to drive their probe engines and exploit the gravitational force of the planets, taking care to avoid failures and unexpected events that await them among the asteroids or along the orbits around the planets.

Will the players be able to complete their mission by avoiding colliding their probes, sending them crashing into the Sun, or losing them at the edge of the Solar System?

Game by Alessandro Caselli
Proofreading by David Lovallo
Playtesting by Simone Lovallo

Cover image by Arek Socha from Pixabay
